name: model-selector
title: Model Selector
description: A dropdown component for selecting AI models with search and filtering capabilities.

files.content:
import {
	RiBrainLine,
	RiCodeLine,
	RiThunderstormsLine,
	RiWindowsLine,
} from "react-icons/ri";
import { SiGoogle, SiMeta, SiOpenai } from "react-icons/si";

/**
 * ModelSelector Customization Guide
 *
 * The ModelSelector component is highly customizable. Here are the available props:
 *
 * @param selectedModelId - Currently selected model ID
 * @param setSelectedModelId - Function to update selected model
 * @param className - Additional CSS classes for styling
 * @param isUserAuthenticated - Whether user is authenticated (affects locked models)
 * @param defaultModelId - Default model to select if none is provided (default: "gpt-4o")
 * @param showKeyboardShortcut - Show ⌘⇧P shortcut tooltip (default: true)
 * @param allowMobileDrawer - Enable mobile drawer on small screens (default: true)
 * @param searchPlaceholder - Custom search placeholder text
 * @param emptyStateMessage - Message when no models found (default: "No results found.")
 * @param emptyStateLink - Link for "Request new model" (set to null to hide)
 * @param models - Custom model array (default: DUMMY_MODELS)
 * @param providers - Custom provider array (default: DUMMY_PROVIDERS)
 *
 * Example usage:
 *
 * Basic:
 * <ModelSelector
 *   selectedModelId={selectedModel}
 *   setSelectedModelId={setSelectedModel}
 * />
 *
 * Customized:
 * <ModelSelector
 *   selectedModelId={selectedModel}
 *   setSelectedModelId={setSelectedModel}
 *   defaultModelId="claude-3-5-sonnet"
 *   showKeyboardShortcut={false}
 *   searchPlaceholder="Find your perfect AI model..."
 *   emptyStateMessage="No models match your criteria."
 * />
 */

export type DummyModel = {
	id: string;
	name: string;
	provider: string;
	providerId: string;
	tags: string[];
	contextLength: number;
	locked: boolean;
	description?: string;
};

export type DummyProvider = {
	id: string;
	name: string;
	icon: React.ComponentType<React.SVGProps<SVGSVGElement>>;
};

export const DUMMY_PROVIDERS: DummyProvider[] = [
	{ id: "openai", name: "OpenAI", icon: SiOpenai },
	{ id: "anthropic", name: "Anthropic", icon: RiBrainLine },
	{ id: "google", name: "Google", icon: SiGoogle },
	{ id: "mistral", name: "Mistral AI", icon: RiThunderstormsLine },
	{ id: "meta", name: "Meta", icon: SiMeta },
	{ id: "microsoft", name: "Microsoft", icon: RiWindowsLine },
	{ id: "cohere", name: "Cohere", icon: RiCodeLine },
];

		contextLength: 128000,
		locked: false,
		description: "Most capable GPT-4 model with vision capabilities",
	},
	{
		id: "gpt-4o-mini",
		name: "GPT-4o Mini",
		provider: "OpenAI",
		providerId: "openai",
		tags: ["fast", "cost-effective", "tools"],
		contextLength: 128000,
		locked: false,

	},
	{

		providerId: "openai",

	},
	{
